Grafana Documentation¶

This section describes the Grafana configuration and how to monitor the system.

Dashboards¶

Grafana dashboards are used to visualize system metrics.

  • celery_dashboard.json: Shows Celery task processing statistics.

  • prometheus_stats.json: Displays Prometheus-related metrics.

  • redis_dashboard.json: Displays Redis server performance data.

Datasource Configuration¶

Datasource configuration is stored in grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasource.yml.
